name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Temp Email Generator – Email Monster | Mask Your Email, Group Future Emails

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate unlimited temp emails with Email Monster. Group future emails into digests, and reduce inbox clutter. Free account required

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your inbox with Email Monster, the ultimate temp email generator. Create unlimited temporary email addresses to mask your real email address and avoid spam. With Email Monster, you can manage incoming emails, merge them into weekly or monthly digests, and block senders or aliases at any time.

Key Features:

-🎭 Mask Your Email: Create pseudo email aliases that forward emails to your real inbox while keeping your actual email address private.

-⌛️ Delay & Merge Newsletters: Group incoming emails from specific senders or aliases into a single weekly or monthly digest to minimize inbox clutter.

- 📮 Email Aliases with No Setup: Your email aliases are automatically created when you receive the first email to a new alias—no need to preconfigure them.

- 📧 Pre-fill Email Inputs: When signing up for websites or newsletters, the extension automatically prefills your temporary email in the signup fields for convenience.

- ✋ Manage Senders: Easily toggle off email forwarding for any alias or sender, stopping unwanted emails instantly.

- 🌈 Custom Domains: Choose your own secret domain for creating personalized email aliases, ensuring total anonymity.

- 🛑 Spam Protection: Block any unwanted emails or senders at any time, protecting your inbox from spam.

- 👀 Email Tracking Prevention: Monitor if your email has been shared or sold by tracking suspicious activity through your aliases.

Whether you're signing up for newsletters, registering on websites, or handling multiple accounts, Email Monster keeps your inbox secure, private, and organized.

Usage Example:

If your real email is clark.kent@gmail.com, and you've chosen superman as your alias, any email sent to anything@superman.eml.monster will be automatically forwarded to your real email, without revealing your true identity.

- Stop Spam: Instantly block emails from any sender or alias with one click.
- Secret Domain: Customize your email alias with a private domain for complete anonymity.
- Unlimited Aliases: Create as many aliases as you want—no setup required, just type and go.

Additional Statistics:

320K+ pseudo email aliases created
1.1M+ emails forwarded
100K+ emails blocked
Create a free account today and start managing your inbox with Email Monster.
